name: Gangplank
title: the Saltwater Scourge
i_displayname: Trial by Fire / Trial by Fire 2

i1.blurb: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Gangplank''' periodically empowers his next [[basic attack]] to burn the target, dealing {{pp|55 to 225|color=true damage}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} over {{fd|2.5}} seconds, ticking every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. {{tip|turret|Turrets}} receive 50% reduced damage.

If '''Gangplank''' successfully hits a target with ''Trial by Fire'', he gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds. Destroying a {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}} resets ''Trial by Fire'' and grants its {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
''Trial by Fire'' cannot be applied with {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} or {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}}.
i1.name: Trial by Fire

q1.blurb: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' shoots the target enemy with his pistol, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} and applying [[on-hit effects]].
''Parrrley'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|100|melee}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
If ''Parrrley'' kills the target, '''Gangplank''' plunders {{gold|gold}} and {{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}}, the latter of which can be spent to upgrade {{ai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank}}.
leveling: {{st|Gold Plunder|{{g|{{ap|3 to 7}}}}|Silver Serpent Plunder|{{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank|icononly=yes}} {{ap|4 to 8}}}}
q1.name: Parrrley
notes: * {{tip|On-hit}} effects that deal area of effect damage will allow ''Parrrley'' to plunder from every enemy killed. This includes enemies killed by '''Gangplank's''' {{ais|Powder Keg|Gangplank}} when activated by ''Parrrley''.
* ''Parrrley'' doesn't count as a basic attack for {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.

w1.blurb: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, removing all [[crowd control]] affecting him and {{tip|heal|healing}} himself.
w1.name: Remove Scurvy
notes: * ''Remove Scurvy'' only removes crowd control debuffs, so it cannot remove:
*** Yet it is one of the few abilities that can remove {{tip|suppression}}.
**** {{ai|Nether Grasp|Malzahar}} and {{ai|Infinite Duress|Warwick}} will still damage '''Gangplank''' even if he moves away.

e1.blurb: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Gangplank''' stores a charge of ''Powder Keg'' periodically, up to a maximum of 3 stored at once.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' places a ''Powder Keg'' at the target location for 25 seconds, which connects to other nearby ''Powder Kegs''.

'''Gangplank''' and his enemies can attack the ''Powder Keg'' with their basic attacks, dealing 1 damage per hit. '''Gangplank''' may also shoot the barrel with ''Parrrley''. If '''Gangplank''' scores the killing blow, it explodes, also triggering a chain reaction that explodes nearby connected ''kegs''. If killed by an enemy, the ''keg'' is safely dismantled.

An exploding ''keg'' deals the {{as|attack's damage}} to all nearby enemies, plus {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} against champions, ignoring {{as|40% of their armor}}, as well as {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds. Enemies can only be damaged once.
e1.name: Powder Keg
notes: * An exploding ''Powder Keg'' will splash {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}} bonus damage, and will also be modified if the attack critically strikes.

* An exploding ''Powder Keg's'' damage is not increased by most [[attack effects]] from runes or items, such as {{ii|Blade of the Ruined King}} or {{ii|Wit's End}}. There is a notable exception, however: the bonus damage from {{ii|Sheen}} (and its upgrades) will be splashed to all targets.
* The ''Powder Keg'' is classified as being hit for the purposes of triggering effects such as {{ii|Tiamat}} with the effects centered on the keg.
* As of [[V7.22]], enemies hit by ''Powder Keg's'' damage will be subject to [[ability effects]].

r1.blurb: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gangplank''' signals his ship off-shore to fire upon the target area for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and {{tip|sight|revealing}} it for the duration. Each wave deals {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies within the area and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 30% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
'''Gangplank''' can purchase upgrades for his ship in the store at the cost of 500 {{ai|Silver Serpents|Gangplank}} each, which improve ''Cannon Barrage'':

{{sbc|{{ii|Death's Daughter}}:}} An initial cannonball lands in the center of the barrage, dealing a cluster's worth of {{as|true damage}} to all enemies it hits and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|{{ii|Raise Morale}}:}} The barrage grants allies {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while they are inside the area, persisting for 2 seconds after leaving it.
{{sbc|{{ii|Fire at Will}}:}} ''Cannon Barrage'' fires{{ft|6 additional waves|2 additional clusters}} over its duration.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Wave|{{ap|40 to 100}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Magic Damage Per Cluster|{{ap|40*3 to 100*3}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}

{{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|40*12 to 100*12}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage with
''Fire at Will''|{{ap|40*18 to 100*18}} {{as|(+ 180% AP)}}|Maximum Mixed Total Damage with
''Fire at Will'' and ''Death's Daughter''|{{ap|40*21 to 100*21}} {{as|(+ 210% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Cannon Barrage
notes: * ''Cannon Barrage's'' slow lingers for 0.25 seconds after affected enemies leave the target area.
